---
title: "EDA: Street Trees"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
# Source preprocessing code
street_trees <- read_csv2("../data/raw/street-trees.csv")
source("../src/preprocessing.R")
```

Lat / lon missingness:

```{r}
# Show missing summary for LATITUDE and LONGITUDE
street_trees |> 
  select(LATITUDE, LONGITUDE) |> 
  summarise(
    missing_lat = sum(is.na(LATITUDE)),
    missing_lon = sum(is.na(LONGITUDE)),
    total_rows = n()
  )
```

Visualize missingness:

```{r}
library(naniar)

street_trees |> 
  select(LATITUDE, LONGITUDE) |>
  gg_miss_var(show_pct = TRUE)
```

Do they have addresses?

```{r}
# Filter rows where LATITUDE or LONGITUDE is NA
street_trees_missing_coords <- street_trees |> 
  filter(is.na(LATITUDE) | is.na(LONGITUDE))

# View a few sample rows
street_trees_missing_coords |> 
  head(50)
```
